summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2017 RAM 3500. WHILE DRIVING WITH A TRAILER CONNECTED, THE "TRAILER BRAKE NOT CONNECTED" MESSAGE ILLUMINATED. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO PINE BELT CHRYSLER JEEP DODGE RAM (1400 OCEAN AVE, ROUTE-88, LAKEWOOD, NJ 08701), BUT THE FAILURE COULD NOT BE DUPLICATED. THE VEHICLE WAS REPAIRED BUT REPAIRS WERE UNKNOWN. THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED AND INFORMED THE CONTACT THAT HE COULD NOT BE REIMBURSED. THE VIN WAS NOT AVAILABLE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 69,000.
